entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 3 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
